name: RRR:Mobile Edition
description:
History:

Raving Rabbids have invaded Rayman's world and kidnapped all his friends! To rescue them, Rayman must now fight the Rabbids and save the day!

Gameplay:The game is very reminiscent of the early Sonic the Hedgehog titles. Rayman must make his way through seven levels (four forest levels and three desert levels)

Rayman can do his standard movements like jumping, running and use his helicopter and telescopic fist powers. Throughout the adventure.

The game has three levels of difficulty: easy, normal and hard. The amount of hearts that Rayman has depends on the difficulty (four in easy, three in normal and one in hard). The player can find stars throughout the levels: collecting 60 of them gives Rayman an extra life.
